page.title: 07RECREATIONAL GROUPS
page.content: In the remote village and area of Barr {self-entertainment}is important and the formation of various bodies has evolved to cater for the needs of all ages. The village hall is administered by the {Barr Community Association}which is made up of representatives from clubs/groups using the hall.Such groups are-{Badminton,Carpet Bowls, {,Drama Group,W.R.I.,Womens Guild, { Sunday School,Tea-Room and Crafts,and {School.Dances/Discos are held {regularly,Coffee Evenings,Concerts, {Plays. Visiting musicians,dancers and {entertainers help provide Ceilidhs. {For those who prefer outdoor {activities there is fishing,shooting, {hill-walking,camping,residential {caravanning,forest walks,horse-riding, {sheepdog trials.
